text: One year from today, we're going to defeat Donald Trump.

💡Quick Daylight Savings tip: if you worked a late shift last night when the clocks rolled back & had to work an extra hour, make sure you check your paystub this week and get paid for it!

Computers sometimes miss it. Make sure you get paid - don’t let your labor get stolen!

3. Head to your location and vote! Make sure you check the times because they vary.

And if you don’t make it today, be sure to vote on Tuesday!

2. Find out how you’re going to vote! This year we have 5 ballot proposals, including one on RANKED CHOICE VOTING which is pretty cool.

Here’s the NYT breakdown on the proposals. It includes their endorsements & rationale but of course vote as you wish: 
https://www.nytimes.com/2019/10/25/opinion/new-york-ballot-questions-2019.html
